data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 436,900 people living in Gomati, Tripura, India. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Gomati, Tripura, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the county of Gomati a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Gomati, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 4,806 believers in the county of Gomati the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.
Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Kechai people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Gomati, Tripura, India to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Gomati, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the county of Gomati to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

location.name: Gomati
location.people_groups_list: Jamatia, Bhin, Bhir, Bru, Halam Molsom
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Jamatia (83,000), Bhin (1,400), Bhir (100), Bru (204,000), Halam Molsom (5,300)
